name: Land of the Dead: Road to Fiddler's Green
name_original: Land of the Dead: Road to Fiddler's Green
description:
Land of the Dead: Road to Fiddler's Green is an action-shooter game developed by Brainbox Games. It came out on 17-10-2005. Groove Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Land of the Dead: Road to Fiddler's Green on PC.
